Class FishThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • FishThread
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransferClient, TransferServer

    public class FishThread
extends java.lang.Object

    A utility class for multi-threading in Fishnet

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int addr 
      static long DEFAULT_INTERVAL
      Default task execution interval (1 second)
      protected Manager manager 
      protected Node node 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FishThread(Manager manager, Node node)
      Create a thread in a Fishnet node with default task execution interval

      Create a thread in a Fishnet node

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      The callback used to execute the task

      • FishThread

        public FishThread(Manager manager,
                  Node node,
                  long interval)
        Create a thread in a Fishnet node
        Parameters:
        manager - Manager The Fishnet manager
        node - Node The node that is creating this thread
        interval - long The task execution interval

      • FishThread

        public FishThread(Manager manager,
                  Node node)
        Create a thread in a Fishnet node with default task execution interval
        Parameters:
        manager - Manager The Fishnet manager
        node - Node The node that is creating this thread

    • Method Detail

      • setInterval

        public void setInterval(long interval)
        Set the task execution interval of this thread
        Parameters:
        interval - long The new task execution interval

      • start

        public void start()
        Start this thread

      • startNow

        public void startNow()
        Start this thread and execute the task now

      • execute

        public void execute()
        The task that is peroidically executed by this thread. This method does nothing and returns. Subclasses should override this method to perform their tasks.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop this thread. No more execution will be scheduled.

      • run

        public final void run()
        The callback used to execute the task
